attributes.action: House people in bona vacantia buildings
attributes.additional_details:
Please empower the Treasury Solicitor to open up & let out bona vacantia buildings.

Was it Rip-off Britain that revealed scamsters taking over & letting out empty properties from the Government's unclaimed estates list?

We're meant to have a housing shortage & there are many hundreds, if not thousands of properties in those 10,000-plus estates.

Couldn't many of those provide homes while helping to pay the Treasury Solicitor's costs, & wouldn't a letting scheme maintain the properties better, too?
